name: CLASAMILO
description:
Only for two Player versus at own device. 

The moves are round Based. Three stones in a line form a bridge, so you can remove a Stone. A bridge should not be made twice.
When only three stones are left, allowed to you to jump to any position. The winner is the one who takes away 7 stones.

System:

  • Display: 1600x900p.
  • For Windows PC & Tablet PC
  • For two Player Versus (need Mouse or Toutchpad).
  • Multiplayer at one device. (No play over internet.)
